verses.text: \w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w heart’s|strong="G2588"\w* \w desire|strong="G2107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* they might be \w saved|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w record|strong="G3140"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they being ignorant \w of|strong="G0050"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* going \w about|strong="G2212"\w* to \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w have|strong="G5293"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* submitted \w themselves|strong="G5293"\w* unto the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add is\add* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* to every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w describeth|strong="G1125"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* which \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* those \w things|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* which is \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G3004"\w* on this \w wise|strong="G3779"\w*, \w Say|strong="G2036"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w ascend|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*? (\w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, to \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \add from above\add*:)

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w descend|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w deep|strong="G0012"\w*? (\w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, to bring \w up|strong="G0321"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w again|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.)

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* saith \w it|strong="G3004"\w*? The \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \add even\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*: \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*;

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou shalt \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shalt \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, thou shalt be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* with the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* man \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* with the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* confession is \w made|strong="G3670"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2617"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="G2617"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w difference|strong="G1293"\w* \w between|strong="G5037"\w* the \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2962"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* over \w all|strong="G3956"\w* is \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that call \w upon|strong="G1941"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* shall call \w upon|strong="G1941"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* shall they call on \w him|strong="G1941"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w have|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*? \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall they \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* in him of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w have|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*? \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall they \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* a \w preacher|strong="G2784"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall they \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* they be \w sent|strong="G0649"\w*? \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w How|strong="G5613"\w* \w beautiful|strong="G5611"\w* are the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* of them that preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, and bring glad \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w* of good \w things|strong="G0018"\w*!

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* they \w have|strong="G5219"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w obeyed|strong="G5219"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w report|strong="G0189"\w*?

So \w then|strong="G0686"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \add cometh\add* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, Have \w they|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*? Yes \w verily|strong="G3304"\w*, \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sound|strong="G5353"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ends|strong="G4009"\w* of the \w world|strong="G3625"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Did|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*? \w First|strong="G4413"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w provoke|strong="G3863"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to \w jealousy|strong="G3863"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \add them that are\add* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w people|strong="G1484"\w*, \add and\add* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* a \w foolish|strong="G0801"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* I will \w anger|strong="G3949"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* is very \w bold|strong="G0662"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, I was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; I was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w manifest|strong="G1717"\w* unto \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w after|strong="G1905"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w All|strong="G3650"\w* day \w long|strong="G2250"\w* I have stretched \w forth|strong="G1600"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* a \w disobedient|strong="G0544"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gainsaying|strong="G0483"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.
